title: ‘Another beautiful armada floating towards Iran’: Trump issues warning as tensions rise
content: US President Trump announced another US "armada" is heading towards Iran, expressing hope for a deal amidst heightened regional tensions. This follows increased US military activity, with Iran issuing sharp warnings against any attacks originating from neighbouring countries. While diplomacy is mentioned, military options remain on the table.

title: Avalanche hits J&K’s Sonamarg after heavy snowfall, burying houses and resorts — video
content: A massive avalanche struck Sonamarg tourist resort in Jammu and Kashmir late Tuesday night, captured on CCTV, but miraculously caused no loss of life. Heavy snowfall across the valley led to flight cancellations at Srinagar airport, stranding tourists, and the closure of the Srinagar-Jammu national highway. Authorities are actively engaged in rescue and clearance operations.

title: Varanasi: Man kills friend after being tricked into eating ‘cow meat’
content: The streets of Varanasi are buzzing with news after the arrest of 24-year-old Virendra Yadav, who stands accused of taking the life of his friend Aftab Alam, 28. Sources indicate that Yadav admitted to the murder, stating he acted out of deep embarrassment when Alam tricked him into eating cow meat and subsequently exposed him.

title: 'Very proud of ancestral roots in Goa': European Council chief flaunts OCI card—watch
content: European Council President Antonio Costa expressed pride in his Goan roots, highlighting his personal connection to India as the EU and India concluded an ambitious free trade agreement. This historic moment marks a new chapter in their relations, strengthening ties in trade, security, and people-to-people connections.

title: ‘Bad for cricket, don’t spoil ties’: Ex-Pakistan stars warn PCB against T20 WC boycott
content: Former Pakistan cricketers and officials are urging the PCB to participate in the T20 World Cup, warning against a boycott in solidarity with Bangladesh. They emphasise prioritising Pakistan's cricketing interests and maintaining good relations with the International Cricket Council and member boards.  Concerns are raised about potential logistical and financial repercussions.

title: Anthropic CEO hints from Davos that Zuckerberg was wrong to let Yann LeCun leave Meta
content: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei contrasted AI companies led by scientists with those run by social media entrepreneurs, implicitly criticizing Meta's direction following Yann LeCun's departure. LeCun reportedly clashed with Mark Zuckerberg over research priorities, leading to his exit and the hiring of a younger executive. This move highlights a perceived difference in approach to AI development and responsibility.

title: KL Rahul drops retirement bombshell: 'When it's time, it's time'
content: KL Rahul has admitted that retirement has crossed his mind, though he believes it is still some time away and won't be a difficult decision when the moment arrives.

title: 'Stop calling my investments & acquisitions circular financing,' says angry Nvidia CEO
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang dismissed claims of 'circular financing' regarding the company's $2 billion investment in cloud provider CoreWeave. Huang stated these investments reflect confidence in 'generational companies' and are a small fraction of the massive capital AI firms need to raise for expansion, emphasizing Nvidia's strategic role in the AI ecosystem.

title: Chilling dashcam, CCTV footage shows Bengaluru techie crushing bodybuilder to death
content: A Bengaluru man was deliberately killed by his friend after an argument escalated during a cricket game and alcohol consumption. The victim, Prashanth M, clung to the SUV of the accused, Roshan Hegde, who then intentionally crashed the vehicle twice, resulting in Prashanth's death. Dashcam footage revealed the fatal sequence of events.

title: Japan’s second-richest man drops $50 billion plan to buy US company
content: SoftBank's Masayoshi Son has reportedly halted talks to acquire US data center operator Switch Inc., a move that impacts his ambitious Stargate AI infrastructure plans. The $50 billion deal, crucial for generating computing power for OpenAI, faced internal concerns over its size and logistics. While a full acquisition is off, discussions for a partial investment or partnership continue.

title: Shooting near US–Mexico border: One critical after Border Patrol-linked incident— what we know
content: A shooting near the US-Mexico border in Arivaca, Arizona, has left one person in critical condition. The incident involved the US Border Patrol, and authorities, including the FBI and Pima County Sheriff's Department, are investigating. The injured individual received immediate medical attention and was airlifted to a trauma center.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: According to Mehul Kothari, DVP - Technical Research, Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers, the top stocks to buy today (January 28, 2026) are Chennai Petroleum, Oil India, and Punjab National Bank (PNB). Let’s take a look:

title: Watch: Nasa research plane makes emergency belly landing in Texas; crew safe
content: A Nasa research plane made an emergency landing in Texas on Tuesday. The aircraft's landing gear failed to deploy, forcing it to slide on its belly. Videos showed sparks and smoke as the plane came to a stop at Ellington Airport near Houston. Both crew members landed safely.

title: Anna Kupp sparks debate wearing Seahawks coat against Rams in NFC showdown
content: Cooper Kupp’s NFC Championship appearance against his former Rams blended football and family into one powerful moment. Now with the Seahawks, the Super Bowl MVP faced his past while drawing strength from his wife Anna and their three sons. The matchup symbolized resilience, loyalty, and a fresh chapter driven by purpose.

title: Patrick Mahomes rehabs quietly as Brittany Mahomes ensures stability for their kids
content: Patrick Mahomes is enduring a demanding offseason as he recovers from an ACL and LCL tear, limiting his usual family routine. While he focuses on rehabilitation and a possible Week 1 return, Brittany Mahomes is creating joyful moments for their children, helping maintain normalcy as the Chiefs star patiently works through recovery.

title: Travis Kelce supports Taylor Swift amid legal troubles as wedding plans pause
content: Travis Kelce has become a steady source of support for Taylor Swift as she navigates emotional strain linked to ongoing legal troubles around her inner circle. While staying publicly silent, Swift has leaned on Kelce’s guidance to protect her peace, set boundaries, and address personal tensions directly, even as wedding plans remain on pause.

title: 'Border 2' sees huge drop; earns Rs 19.5cr on day 5
content: 'Border 2' experienced a significant box office dip on its first Tuesday, collecting approximately Rs 19.5 crore after a massive Republic Day haul. Despite a strong opening and an impressive Rs 59 crore on Monday, the film's occupancy dropped considerably. However, with a current net collection of Rs 196.50 crore and a worldwide total of Rs 270.

title: 'Attacked with knife': How suspicion over relationship led to HR manager's beheading at workplace
content: An HR manager in Agra was allegedly beheaded and dismembered by her lover after an argument over her contact with another man. The accused attempted to dispose of the body parts in the Yamuna River but fled when noticed by passersby. He later confessed to the crime after being arrested.

title: 'One bad day can undo everything': Dravid cautions Team India, reflects on 2023 WC pain
content: Former India coach Rahul Dravid believes India is a strong contender to win the upcoming T20 World Cup. He praises the team's current approach and their consistent performance. Dravid also credits Rohit Sharma for transforming India's white-ball cricket. He emphasizes that despite their strength, T20 cricket demands peak performance on the day.

title: ‘Very bad choice’: Trump warns US will end support for Iraq if Maliki returns as PM
content: US President Donald Trump warned that the U.S. would cease all support for Iraq if ex-prime minister Nouri al-Maliki returns to power. Trump cited Maliki's previous tenure, which he claims led to poverty and chaos, as a reason for this stance. This intervention follows similar concerns raised by Secretary of State Marco Rubio.

title: Delhi sees wettest January in 4 years, February to start with rain
content: Delhi experienced its wettest January in four years, with Tuesday's rainfall pushing the month's total to 25.3 mm. While more rain is unlikely until February 1st, the city's air quality worsened to 'very poor' following the downpour. Temperatures saw a dip, with a significant rise in the minimum temperature.

title: Devotees locked inside Odisha church, 30 families claim 'harassment' over prayers
content: Tensions have escalated in Odisha's Kapena village where local Christian families confront intimidation and threats intended to coerce them into renouncing their beliefs. A recent disturbance at a prayer service resulted in two young residents being reportedly attacked.

title: Arijit Singh says he’s not done with music, cites multiple reasons for quitting playback singing
content: Popular Bollywood singer Arijit Singh, who wooed generations with his soulful voice in songs like Tum Hi Ho, Kesariya and Channa Mereya, left fans stunned after announcing that he will no longer take up new assignments as a playback vocalist. While calling time on one chapter of his career, Arijit made it clear that he is not stepping away from music itself.

title: Actor Varun Dhawan fined after viral grab-handle video in Mumbai Metro
content: Actor Varun Dhawan faced a Rs 500 fine for causing a public nuisance on the Mumbai Metro. A viral video showed him hanging from grab handles, prompting the metro operator to issue a safety advisory. The operator emphasized that such actions endanger passengers and violate safety norms, leading to penalties under the Metro Railways Act.

title: ‘Invitation to crashes’: 4-lane bridge near Mumbai suddenly narrows to 2; MMRDA denies design flaw
content: The recent construction of a Mira-Bhayander flyover is stirring controversy among local residents, who are voicing their frustrations over the unexpected reduction from four lanes to two. Many commuters are worried this change will exacerbate traffic congestion.

title: NBA trade rumors: Rockets eye $197mn Cavaliers star to pair with Kevin Durant
content: Houston Rockets are eyeing Cleveland Cavaliers point guard Darius Garland.  A trade could see Garland join Kevin Durant in Houston.  This move aims to bolster playmaking for the Rockets.  Cleveland might receive Jalen Green and draft picks in return.  The deal could reshape both teams' rosters.  Garland's addition offers offensive structure.  Houston seeks to improve its guard situation.

title: ‘Never been stronger’: Ursula von der Leyen hails Europe–India ties at presidential banquet
content: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen declared Europe-India political ties are stronger than ever, highlighted by a new Free Trade Agreement and Security and Defence Partnership. This collaboration signals a commitment to dialogue and cooperation amidst global uncertainty, aiming to bolster economic growth and strategic stability for both regions. The agreements mark a significant advancement in bilateral relations.

title: Man lives after rod pierces neck, narrowly misses brain and spine
content: A multidisciplinary medical team successfully removed a metal rod from a patient's neck after a fall at a construction site. The rod, which had pierced the neck laterally at an angle, passed dangerously close to vital structures.

title: Cousins die in snow, pitbull stands guard for 4 days
content: A loyal pitbull named Jonu stood guard for four days over his deceased young owners, Viksit and Piyush, who tragically froze to death in Himachal's Chamba district. Rescuers found the brave dog refusing to leave their side. The cousins, aspiring vloggers, ventured into treacherous snow-laden mountains for content, leading to their fatal trek.

title: 3-year-old girl dies after 2 loudspeakers fall on her during Republic Day celebrations in Mumbai
content: A tragic incident in Vikhroli saw a three-year-old girl killed when two Republic Day celebration loudspeakers fell on her. The speakers toppled after a clothes scrap dealer accidentally brushed against their wires. The event has sparked outrage, with residents blaming organizers for inadequate safety measures.

title: France passes bill to ban social media use for children under 15
content: French lawmakers have approved a bill to ban social media use for children under 15, a measure championed by President Macron to safeguard young users and limit screen time. The National Assembly's vote sends the bill to the Senate, with potential implementation by the 2026 school year. This legislation also proposes a ban on mobile phones in high schools.

title: BIAL mulls app-based access for private taxis at Bengaluru airport T1 pickup zones
content: Airport taxi operators, previously moved to a distant parking lot, may soon access the pick-up zone near Terminal 1. Bengaluru International Airport Limited is trialing a system with KSTDC's app, requiring driver registration and passenger details for access. This move aims to resolve passenger and driver complaints following recent traffic changes.

title: Delhi Assembly to engage over 100 fellows, associates to help with research work
content: Delhi Assembly plans to hire over 100 legislative assistants, including an associate fellow for each of the 70 MLAs and 35 fellows for research. These professionals will support MLAs and the assembly with legislative and constituency-related work, mirroring Parliament's system. Speaker Vijender Gupta emphasized a transparent and fair selection process, aiming to avoid past controversies.

title: Luke Littler opens up about dad’s bobble hat tradition at darts majors
content: Luke Littler revealed that his dad Anthony wears a bobble hat at tournaments to support The Matthew22 Fund, a children’s charity. The idea began after appearing on Michael McIntyre’s Big Show. The charity helps families facing serious illness. Littler is also involved in the Team Up campaign to fight male loneliness through sport.

title: Carlos Alcaraz pens emotional message to father after AO semifinal
content: Carlos Alcaraz reached his first Australian Open semi-final after beating Alex de Minaur. After the win, he shared an emotional message about his father and family support. Alcaraz said his team helps him feel at home and play better tennis. He now prepares to face Alexander Zverev in the semi-final.

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026 LIVE: Budget session to begin today; parties line up key issues like SIR, MGNREGA for debate
content: The Economic Survey of India is scheduled to be presented on January 29, followed by the Union Budget 2026-27, to be presented on February 1, 2026

title: India looking to deepen global aviation partnerships at Wings India 2026, says Civil Aviation Minister Rammohan Naidu
content: Union Civil Aviation Minister K. Rammohan Naidu said India wants to deepen its relationships with organisations and countries across the world, particularly in aviation

title: Private sleeper bus catches fire near Hosanagara in Karnataka
content: Three people, including the driver and conductor, suffered burn injuries, while a few others sustained minor injuries

title: Kadavanthra-Panampilly Nagar circular feeder bus service extended
content: Kochi Metro Rail Limited managing director Loknath Behera flagged off the extended service at a function held in Kasturba Nagar.

title: Avalanche hits J&K’s Sonamarg tourist resort; officials say no casualty
content: Officials said the avalanche hit Sonamarg resort in central Kashmir’s Ganderbal district at 10:12 p.m.

title: Telangana DGP commends Sarvejana Foundation’s road safety initiatives
content: He was speaking after releasing road safety stickers and a short awareness film titled Badram Naanna at the DGP office in Hyderabad

title: Tharoor stays silent on CPI(M) leanings but vows direct talks with Congress leaders
content: The Congress MP clarifies that his absence from the high-level Congress meeting in New Delhi was simply a matter of bad timing

title: Multi-Lane Free Flow tolling pilot soon on Bengaluru–Mysuru highway
content: The MLFF system replaces traditional toll booths with overhead gantries equipped with satellite-based GPS technology, high-performance RFID FASTag readers and Automated Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) cameras.

title: Three arrested, drugs worth ₹4 lakh seized in separate cases in Bengaluru
content: In another case, the Jalahalli police arrested a drug peddler and seized 31 gm of MDMA worth approximately ₹3 lakh

title: How a political and legal battle halted efforts to conserve Tiruvannamalai temple 25 years ago
content: More than two decades ago, the Archaeological Survey of India proposed to declare the Arunachaleswara temple a “monument of national importance.” The proposal, however, was shelved after a row fomented by vested interests

title: Capturing the cruelty of leprosy in a dark and merciless language
content: The anguish and alienation associated with leprosy have long made it a potent subject in literature, inspiring some of the modern writing in Tamil

title: Maharashtra, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu have highest number of vacancies under the NEET-PG 2025-26
content: “Prohibitive cost of education, lack of good teaching staff, infrastructure, patient load, and stipend deterrents,” experts said

title: Heavy police deployment to ensure peaceful municipal elections in Telangana
content: To instil confidence among voters, flag marches involving armed forces will be conducted in more than 1,000 sensitive and vulnerable locations across the State, the DGP said

title: Excise in Kochi steps up anti-drug drive with new intelligence wing
content: Two teams, comprising 22 officials, deployed to gather intelligence on suspected trafficking of narcotic items and other contraband; excise in talks with Narcotics Control Bureau to expand intelligence network

title: In a fresh attack, Rohini Acharya alleges RJD is on the brink of ruin
content: Few days back, she had criticised the members of her family for allegedly destroying a legacy, and claimed that outsiders are not needed for that.

title: A political dust storm over the Singareni coal mines
content: The Congress and the BRS are involved in mudslinging over the alleged irregularities in tenders for removal of overburden in the coal mines.

title: Stalin launches project for women’s safety, HPV vaccination initiative at global summit
content: Tamil Nadu Women Employment and Safety Project will promote sustainable and inclusive economic development through targeted interventions for employment, safety, and empowerment. The vaccination drive will begin in Ariyalur, Dharmapuri, Perambalur, and Tiruvannamalai districts

title: After AIADMK comes to power, families of tamers killed in jallikattu will be given ₹10 lakh, says Palaniswami
content: He also says insurance cover will be extended to all registered bull tamers and the participating bulls

title: Kerala HC flays SIT’s ‘delay’ in filing chargesheet in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: Court cites how a delay could lead to persons who had been arraigned as accused in the case getting statutory bail

title:
A.P. govt. rolls out SOP for scientific 
de-siltation of urban drains
content: The SOP mandates replacing sporadic, reactive drain cleaning with a planned, technology-driven and accountability-based system, says official

title: Integrated laboratories in 13 Area Hospitals in A.P. to be ready by April
content: 134 tests relating to communicable and non-communicable diseases can be performed at these labs being set up under PM-ABHIM at a cost of ₹16.25 crore

title: Jailed MP Rashid expresses concern over ‘harassment’ of journalists in Kashmir
content: Various State and non-State actors wanted them to carry narratives of their choice, but most of these journalists resisted,” MP Engineer Rashid said

title: Railways to serve non-vegetarian food on Howrah-Guwahati Vande Bharat Express
content: The move comes after demand for non-vegetarian food on the train by a section of passengers, and the support of some BJP leaders from West Bengal

title: In a first, private technical staff to assist officials in Census
content: Registrar General and Census Commissioner of India Mritunjay Kumar Narayan tells States and Union Territories that the target is to ‘get the digitised data from the field itself’; manpower will be hired on contract through outsourcing agencies

title: CPI(M) slams India-EU FTA as ‘surrender of economic interests’
content: Party says steep tariff cuts will hit jobs, hurt domestic industries, and deepen ties with Israel amid the Gaza crisis

title: Nashik to Mumbai long march likely to be withdrawn on January 28 after assurance from CM Fadnavis
content: A delegation of CPI(M) and All India Kisan Sabha held a meeting with five Ministers and several officials of Maharashtra government, for a few hours in the State Secretariat on Tuesday (January 27, 2026) afternoon

title: Maharashtra government temporarily suspends eviction of tribals from Sanjay Gandhi National Park
content: The eviction drive was carried out in compliance with the Bombay High Court and its appointed High Power Committee orders, as per Sanjay Gandhi National Park officials

title: Prime Minister lauds ‘ambitious’ trade deal with European Union
content: ‘Historic’ FTA a boost to investment between India and the European Union, says Modi; pact brings together Indian services and skills with European capital and innovations, says EU chief; deal ‘opens a whole new world’, says Union Home Minister

title: Terror suspect held by Gujarat ATS
content: The accused, Faizan Shaikh, had illegally procured a weapon and ammunition with the intention of targeting a specific group in order to spread fear and terror, officials said

title: SIR hearing: Place in electoral roll is a ‘qualified right’, Election Commission says in Supreme Court
content: SIR seeks to verify, not determine citizenship, says Election Commission; adds that a place in the electoral roll is a “qualified right”, according to eligibility parameters in the Constitution, Representation of the People Act

title: New UGC equity regulations spark student protests, political fallout in U.P.
content: Section of students demonstrates at Lucknow University, claiming the University Grants Commission (Promotion of Equity in Higher Education Institutions) Regulations, 2026, could lead to caste conflict and disrupt social harmony on campuses.

title: BJP president Nitin Nabin visits West Bengal
content: Instead of visiting Kolkata, the BJP president chose Durgapur and Asansol in the south western part of the State. The region has a strong BJP presence and the party’s performance in this part of the state is crucial in the upcoming assembly polls

title: Only two Nipah virus disease cases reported in West Bengal since December 2025, says Health Ministry
content: A total of 196 contacts linked to the confirmed cases have been identified, traced, monitored, and tested. All traced contacts have been found asymptomatic and have tested negative

title: U.P. official quits job to extend support to Yogi Adityanath in Shankaracharya row
content: Prashant Kumar Singh, posted as Deputy GST Commissioner in Ayodhya, sent his resignation to the Governor

title: DMK delegation to meet Rahul Gandhi over sharing of seats
content: According to sources in both parties, DMK Parliamentary Party leader Kanimozhi Karunanidhi is set to meet Mr. Gandhi to convey her party high-command’s offer of seats for the Assembly election

title: Labour unions welcome Karnataka’s welfare board for Gig workers, seek stronger social security
content: Under the framework notified by the State government, both aggregator platforms and gig workers will be required to register with the welfare board

title: Congress to press MGNREGA, SIR, foreign policy concerns in Budget session; Opposition to meet
content: Environmental concerns, including the redefinition of the Aravalli hills and the Great Nicobar project, would also be flagged the party, Congress leader and Rajya Sabha Whip Naseer Hussain says

title: No discrimination under new UGC equity rules, says Education Minister
content: ABVP says regulations “well-intentioned” but require “clarity and balance”; NSUI welcomes the regulations

title: Physiotherapists, occupational therapists can use the ‘Dr.’ title, says Kerala HC
content: The court noted that the National Medical Commission Act does not contain any provision conferring the title “Dr.” exclusively on medical professionals

title: EU, India commit to collaboration on ‘peaceful uses’ of nuclear power
content: Statement also cites “deepening cooperation” under the EU research and innovation programme, including in the fields of energy, water, agri food, health, semiconductors, biotech, advanced materials

title: Expect a realistic and practical State Budget: Balagopal
content: Finance Minister — whose sixth Budget is also the final one of the present LDF government as Kerala moves towards the Assembly elections — says his presentation on Thursday will reflect the LDF conviction that it will continue in power in the State

title: New Labour Codes will help protect workers’ interests and boost jobs, says Union Minister
content: Shobha Karandlaje says these reforms will ensure transparency, social security and ease of doing business, calls for strong Centre–State coordination

title: BRS leaders meet Governor, urge him to recommend probe into Singareni OB tenders
content: Opposition party flags alleged irregularities in solar power projects, explosives supply in Singareni

title: Railway stations renovation work in Thiruvananthapuram Division to be completed in February, says DRM
content: Besides the renovated Chirayinkeezhu and Kulitturai stations – inaugurated by the Prime Minister recently – 11 additional stations undergoing renovation will be opened by February

title: Twenty20’s entry into NDA was not to evade ED case, says Sabu Jacob
content: He say  the ED had issued notice to the company in May last year seeking relevant documents for the last few years since the COVID-19 pandemic as part of the usual procedure to verify whether the entire value of its foreign exports had been realised in India

title: City student among top 100 in Veer Gatha initiative
content: Project Veer Gatha 5.0 encourages students to create projects celebrating the bravery and life stories of gallantry awardees and great Indian warriors

title: FCV tobacco farmers urge rollback of steep excise duty hike
content: Delegation from four districts tells Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu that over 70% increase has hit auctions, prices and rural livelihoods, and fuelled illicit cigarette trade

title: Sources: Belichick not a 1st-ballot Hall of Famer
content: Bill Belichick, the eight-time Super Bowl-winning coach, will not be a first-ballot Hall of Famer, sources told ESPN.

title: Broncos fire OC Lombardi after falling short of SB
content: Broncos offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi was fired Tuesday along with wide receivers coach Keary Colbert and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch.

title: Rybakina ousts No. 2 Swiatek in Aussie quarters
content: Elena Rybakina defeated Iga Swiatek 7-5, 6-1 on Wednesday to reach the semifinals of the Australian Open and prevent the No. 2 seed from completing the career Grand Slam.

title: Champion Hoosiers draw OSU, U-M back-to-back
content: Indiana, the reigning national champion, will face off against Big Ten powers Ohio State and Michigan in back-to-back weeks next season.

title: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings
content: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama on Tuesday articulated his thoughts on a pair of fatal shootings by federal agents in Minneapolis, saying, "Every day I wake up and see the news and I'm horrified."

title: Flagg, Knueppel, Edgecombe get Rising Stars nods
content: Cooper Flagg, Kon Knueppel and VJ Edgecombe were the first three picks for the NBA's Rising Stars Challenge.

title: Bills promote Brady to head coach on 5-year deal
content: The Bills have promoted offensive coordinator Joe Brady to head coach on a five-year deal, the team announced Tuesday.

title: Payton: Nix was 'predisposed' to inevitable injury
content: Sean Payton said at his season-ending news conference Tuesday that Denver Broncos quarterback Bo Nix had a preexisting ankle condition that made a fracture inevitable.

title: 🏈 Connelly's top 100 games of 2025 CFB season
content: From CFP (and FCS playoff) classics to OT thrillers and what-the-heck moments, this season had it all.

title: 'Insane ...': Patrick Mahomes leads reactions to Belichick missing first-ballot HOF nod
content: The sports world was abuzz on social media after news that the legendary coach wouldn't be a first ballot Hall of Famer broke.

title: Top 100 MLB prospects for 2026: This year's No. 1 is in a tier of his own
content: Where do stars of tomorrow such as Konnor Griffin and Kevin McGonigle land as we rank baseball's best young players?

title: Women's Bracketology: How a new metric will help (or hurt) bubble teams
content: Understanding wins above bubble helps explain why Virginia, which has a 37 NET ranking, is on the outside looking in.

title: The three key factors that helped the Avalanche turn into a juggernaut
content: Colorado is flirting with NHL records for team performance. We dive deep on the NHL's most dominant team.

title: Bobby Marks' NBA trade deadline guide: What to know about all 30 teams
content: What deals could kick-start the NBA trade deadline? Bobby Marks examines the players, picks and priorities you need to know for all 30 teams.

title: Four offseason lessons from two unlikely Super Bowl teams: Savvy moves for the Seahawks, Patriots
content: It's easy to be skeptical about big free agency spending, midtier QB contracts and defensive-minded coaches. But the Seahawks and Patriots proved everyone wrong.

title: First look at Seahawks-Patriots: Early Super Bowl picks, big questions, key matchups
content: Ahead of the Feb. 8 showdown, we have predictions, matchup insight, looming questions and team breakdowns.

content: It's a two-player race for NFL MVP. We made cases for quarterbacks Matthew Stafford and Drake Maye to win the award -- then our experts made their picks.

content: Behind the scenes with Denver Broncos coach Sean Payton, before and after his failed fourth-down decision.

title: The Premier League stars who could still move this transfer window
content: There is less than a week to go in the January transfer window. Here are the Premier League players who still need a move away this month.

title: What it's really like for a player switching clubs in the January transfer window
content: Former Man City defender reveals how the transfer window can be full of uncertainty, selfishness and betrayal.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye move for Rennes' Meïté
content: Manchester United are keeping tabs on Rennes striker Mohamed Kader Meïté. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: How Premier League clubs turned into corporations and replaced 'managers' with 'head coaches'
content: Premier League clubs are corporations that have outgrown the "manager" role that legendary Arsenal and Man United clubs once had. Why?

content: All the rankings, projections, cheat sheets, strategy and analysis you need for the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

content: Eric Karabell outlines the prospects most likely to have an impact on the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

content: Andreas Hale breaks down all the action from the last episode of "Raw" before Saturday's Royal Rumble.

title: Best of Day 1 at the Senior Bowl: Which draft prospects turned the most heads on Tuesday?
content: Here are the top NFL draft risers from the first day of Senior Bowl practices, where the defensive line class stood out.

title: 'Bulldoze these guys': Alexander Volkanovski's vow after 2,996 days of waiting
content: By the time Alexander Volkanovski makes his Octagon walk on Sunday, it will be 2,996 days since he last fought in Sydney. A lot has changed since then, but a late-career lingering UFC narrative remains a constant.

title: Benny the Bull picks new number after Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey retirement
content: Benny had worn No. 1 since 1969. In honor of Rose's jersey retirement, the beloved mascot enters a new era.

title: Ranking this weekend's fights: From Lopez-Shakur to Zayas-Baraou
content: Nick Parkinson ranks the weekend's fights from best to worst and breaks down what's at stake in each matchup.

title: Rajnath praises DRDO scientists, asks them to ‘increase appetite for risk in research’
content: defence minister praises DRDO scientists for their role in strengthening strategic capabilities through the development of tanks, missiles and rocket systems . he advises them to 'increase your cooperation with the public and PSUs and share your knowledge with them'

title: Snow grips Srinagar; highways shut, flights grounded across Kashmir
content: fresh snowfall swept Kashmir valley, shutting the Srinagar–Jammu national highway, cancelling all flights and stranding hundreds of tourists . the winter returned with force, reminding why snow in the region stops life and steals hearts . a second western disturbance draped Kashmir valley and Pir Panjal ranges in snow .

title: Drug Smuggler Who Fled During Nepal's Gen-Z Protests Arrested In Gujarat
content: In a significant move, Ahmedabad Special Operations Group (SOG) Crime Branch, an international narcotics smuggler who escaped a Nepalese prison during massive civil unrest has been arrested in Gujarat.

title: US Lawmaker Ilhan Omar Gets Sprayed With Unknown Substance At Minneapolis Town Hall
content: A man sprayed an unknown substance on Democratic US Representative Ilhan Omar and was tackled to the ground Tuesday during a town hall she was hosting in Minneapolis.

title: HR Manager Killed By Lover In Agra. He Chops Up Body, Throws Head In Canal
content: A 30-year-old man allegedly killed his lover in Uttar Pradesh's Agra, chopped up her body, put her head in a bag, and threw it in a canal, a police official said on Tuesday.

title: Russia-Ukraine War Has Caused Nearly 2 Million Military Casualties: Report
content: Russia's grinding invasion of Ukraine has caused nearly two million military casualties -- killed, wounded or missing -- between the two countries, according to a study published Tuesday by a US think tank.

title: Opinion: Opinion | On The Plate: How India-EU FTA Will (And Won't) Change Indian Kitchens
content: For all those who had been waiting since 2007 for the much-anticipated India-European Union (EU) Free Trade Agreement (FTA), the wait will end only next year after the European Parliament finally ratifies the "mother of all deals" sealed in New Delhi

title: TDP Pushes For Amaravati Capital Status, Social Media Ban For Minors At All-Party Meet
content: The Telugu Desam Party (TDP), a key ally in the NDA, has intensified its demand for giving Amaravati permanent legal status as the capital of Andhra Pradesh.

title: Son Of Government Official, 16, Rams BMW Into Scooter To "Settle Score" In Nashik
content: A 16-year-old boy driving a BMW car hit a scooter from the rear side, seriously injuring its two occupants in Nashik city of Maharashtra, a fallout of a past dispute between the trio, police said on Tuesday.

title: On Camera, Massive Avalanche Hits J&K's Sonamarg, Burying Houses In Snow
content: A massive avalanche swept through the Sarbal area of Sonamarg in Jammu & Kashmir's Ganderbal district Tuesday night, engulfing houses and vehicles.

title: New Terror Nexus In Making? Pak Lashkar Commander Admits To Hamas Links
content: In a significant development pointing to deeper coordination among global terrorist groups, a senior terrorist commander of Pakistan-based Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) has publicly acknowledged links with Hamas and confirmed meetings with its top leadership

title: Case Against Ex-Bengaluru Techie For Stealing Software Data Worth Rs 87 Crore
content: An FIR has been registered against a former senior employee of an IT firm for allegedly stealing the company's proprietary software source code valued at approximately Rs 87 crore, police said on Tuesday.

title: Iran US Tension Highlights: Trump Convinced 'To Give Iran A Chance' After Threats
content: Iran said that it will defend itself "against any foreign threat," the country's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi said on Thursday.

title: German Chancellor In India Highlights: PM Modi Hails India-Germany Ties After Meeting With Merz
content: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz's India Tour Highlights: Merz's visit from Monday -- his first to an Asian country since he took office last May -- comes two weeks ahead of a planned EU-India summit.

title: Delhi High Court Halts AI Film Over Unauthorised Use Of Pawan Kalyan's Son's Identity
content: The Delhi High Court has restrained the circulation and broadcast of an AI-generated film exploiting the name, personality and likeness of Akira Nandan, son of Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister and actor Pawan Kalyan.

title: India-EU Pact Will Create Market Of About 2 Billion People: Piyush Goyal
content: Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal on Tuesday said the ambitious India-EU free trade agreement is likely to be implemented within the 2026 calendar year, hours after the announcement of the conclusion of negotiations for the historic trade pact.

title: Trump Says Will "De-Escalate A Little Bit" In Minneapolis
content: US President Donald Trump said Tuesday he would "de-escalate a little bit" in Minneapolis, amid a backlash over the killings of two people by federal immigration agents.

title: BJP President Nitin Nabin Holds Strategy Meet In West Bengal Ahead Of Polls
content: Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) National President Nitin Nabin held a high-level strategy meeting with senior leaders of the West Bengal BJP in Durgapur, as part of the party's preparations for the upcoming state assembly elections.

title: "Nothing Normal" In Dealing With US, Mark Carney Tells Canada Parliament
content: There's currently "nothing normal" about dealing with the United States, Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney told parliament Tuesday, as he faced questions over his handling of relations with President Donald Trump.

title: Inequality On Rise, Welfare In Retreat: Congress Slams Government
content: Ahead of the release of the Economic Survey and the presentation of the Union Budget, the Congress on Tuesday questioned the numbers the government has been presenting and claimed that "inequality is on the rise" with welfare in "retreat".

title: Trump Says "Cuba Will Be Failing Pretty Soon"
content: US President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that "Cuba will be failing pretty soon," adding that Venezuela, once the island's top supplier, has not recently sent oil or money to Cuba.

title: One Injured In Shooting Involving US Border Patrol In Arizona
content: One person was shot and in critical condition Tuesday in a shooting involving the Border Patrol near the U.S.- Mexico border, authorities in Arizona said.

title: Boycott families if kids opt for love marriage: MP village panchayat
content: 'Khap-style' decree sparked tension in panchewa village panchayat . it calls for total social and economic boycott of the families whose children opt for love marriages . 'we are conducting 'Jan Samvad' (public dialogue) in the village .

title: IndiGo extends flight cancellations to Tbilisi, Baku, Almaty and Tashkent till Feb 11

title: Texas freezes H-1B hiring: Governor directs state agencies, universities to halt visa petitions
content: the freeze will remain in place until may 31, 2027, with limited exceptions requiring written approval from the Texas Workforce Commission . 'abuse' of the visa programme is '100% targeting' of those already vetted . this marks a major setback for foreign professionals seeking to work in the red state .

title: Aaron Judge selected as MLB The Show 26 cover athlete
content: Aaron Judge becomes the second player to appear on the game's cover twice . the game launches on march 17 with early access beginning on march 13 . judge is shown in the new york Yankees ' iconic pinstripes .

title: Suvendu questions Amartya Sen's contribution to Bengal, stirs row
content: Rohit Khanna covers sectors like government finance, economy, industry and issues related to financial crime.

title: Op Trashi-I: Searches continue in Kishtwar after fresh gunfight
content: a joint team of security forces has been combing the dense forests of J&K’s Kishtwar district for the past two days . the first fire exchange between troops and terrorists occurred in Sonnar village near Mandral-Singhpora on Jan 18 . another gunfight broke out with holed-up ultras in Singhpeora . a jaish-e-Mohammad terrorist was shot dead on Jan 24 .

title: India, EU seal key trade, defence pacts as PM Modi hails new era in ties
content: Determine the monthly installment amount for a loan Estimate the returns on investments made through SIPs Find out maturity amount and interest earned on PPF Check maturity amount and interest earned on an FD Estimate the pension amount and corpus accumulated under NPS A Mutual Fund Calculator helps estimate the future value of investments

title: Boxing divisional rankings: Muratalla climbs after IBF title defense over Cruz
content: the lightweights were separated by one punch on CompuBox, but Muratalla appeared to land the harder punches . it was the first time that the lightweight champion fought past 10 rounds in his seven-fight pro career . he moves up to no. 4 from no. 6 in the ESPN lightweight rankings .

title: Super Bowl betting buzz: How one bettor's $100 bet could turn into $310,000
content: our super bowl betting buzz file aims to provide fans a look at the sports betting stories leading up to the big game . the matchup for super Bowl LX is set with the Seattle Seahawks favored over the new England Patriots to take home the Lombardi Trophy .

title: MLS, Polymarket join forces in prediction markets
content: the NHL became the first major professional U.S. league to announce a deal with prediction markets in October last year . prediction markets such as Polymarket and Kalshi allow users to trade on the yes/no outcome of events .

title: MMA divisional rankings: 10 ranked fighters at UFC 324 -- and only one moved
content: the men's flyweight fight won by Natalia Silva did not produce a change in that top 10 . the only rankings change came at heavyweight, where Waldo Cortes-Acosta moved up one spot to no. 6 .

title: Six predictions and 15 NFL draft prospects to watch in Mobile
content: top 2026 prospects are converging on mobile, Alabama, this week for the Panini Senior Bowl . the annual invite-only showcase begins with practices Tuesday and concludes with a game Saturday (2:30 p.m. ET, NFL Network). there are two-hour practice sessions Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday .

title: UCLA's Bob Chesney: Coal miner, bartender, coach of the Bruins
content: new coach Bob Chesney has mined coal, slung Red Bull and vodkas behind a bar . he has worked every on-field job from strength coach to special teams coach . "he's the kind of guy I want to get in the foxhole with," athletic director says .

title: 2026 Big Ten college football: Schedules for all 18 conference teams
content: the big Ten announced its 2026 college football schedule for each of its 18 members . each team -- except for USC -- will only have one bye week . new head coaches at Michigan, Michigan State, Penn State and UCLA in 2026 .

title: The 10 NBA teams that have the most to trade for Giannis
content: the 18-26 Bucks are on pace for their worst record in 10 years . they are in danger of picking in the lottery f1 . if Antetokounmpo is drafted, the Bucks will face a franchise-altering decision .

title: Despite a 'disaster' debut season, Jets still believe in Aaron Glenn
content: Aaron Glenn took an early-evening walk around the perimeter of the new york Jets . he would wake up at 3:30 a.m., unable to sleep because of anticipation of his first practice . "it hit me, and it hit me pretty hard," a wistful Glenn says .

title: MLB's top five breakout teams for 2026: A healthier Braves squad? A bounce-back in Baltimore?
content: a breakout team is a club that wins at least 10 more games than what would be expected by its established level of play . we'll use wins per 162 games for the previous two seasons, while giving double weight to the most recent season . last season, the highest baseline win level was the Los Angeles Dodgers .

title: Wetzel: Let football be football. And let it snow.
content: new England beat Denver 10-7 in the aFC championship game . the teams combined for just 48 fourth-quarter yards and zero points . there was plenty of complaining on social media about how the elements shouldn't impact games of such magnitude . can football still be football and not tinkered with until it is some algorithm-based product .

title: Santiago Gimenez interview: World Cup dreams for Mexico, friendship with Pulisic
content: Santiago Giménez is key to Mexico 's plans for the men's world cup . the 24-year-old is in the middle of a fitness battle to be ready for the tournament . he completed a $38 million transfer from Dutch club Feyenoord to Milan in January 2025 .

title: The two sides of Mitch Marner's return home to Toronto
content: the Toronto Maple Leafs honor Mitch Marner in a tribute video . the star player spent nine seasons with the team . he left his hometown team and joined the Vegas Golden Knacks . marner's car was stolen and his address was leaked online .
